room_title: Escape room "Ship Happens" by Locked In at The Lakes in Akron
room_description: While vacationing with friends, you embark on a happy hour cruise.  The first stop was supposed to be a waterfront tiki bar, but your captain, Morgan, decided to hit up a sand bar first, severely damaging the ship and sending its remains to was up on a nearby island. With no sign of Captain Morgan, and sunset quickly approaching, you and your crew must search the island for a radio and call for help.
